edu.cnm.deepdive.teamsamurai.controller

Class UserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cnm.deepdive.teamsamurai.controller.UserController

  • @RestController
 @ExposesResourceFor(value=User.class)
 @RequestMapping(value="/users")
public class UserController
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines REST endpoints for servicing requests on User resources, invoking UserRepository methods to perform the required operations.

      Initializes this instance, injecting an instance of UserRepository

        @GetMapping(produces="application/json")
public java.lang.Iterable<User> get()

      • post

        @PostMapping(produces="application/json",
             consumes="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<User> post(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                User user)
        Adds the provided User resource to the database and returns the completed resource, including timestamp & ID. The provided resource is only required to contain a text property, with a non-null value.
        Parameters:
        user - partial User resource.
        Returns:
        completed User resource.

            produces="application/json")
public User get(@PathVariable(value="userId")
                                                                                         java.util.UUID id)
        Retrieves and returns the User resource with the specified ID.

        Returns:
